languages.text: "Пороки и жестокость волочатся за тобой следом подобно сумрачной тени, в которой все четче проявляется злорадный оскал Той, Что Жаждет. Эта тень поглотит тебя и всех, кто рядом. Безвозвратно — если ты не начнешь с ней бороться. Я готова помочь тебе в этой битве, если ты соглас{mf|ен|на} сойти с пути скверны. В противном случае... я не стану рисковать бессмертной душой, оставаясь подле".

"Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. This shadow will swallow you and everyone around you. And it will become irrevocable if you do not start fighting it. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."
languages.original_text: "Пороки и жестокость волочатся за тобой следом подобно сумрачной тени, в которой все четче проявляется злорадный оскал Той, Что Жаждет. Эта тень поглотит тебя и всех, кто рядом. Безвозвратно — если ты не начнешь с ней бороться. Я готова помочь тебе в этой битве, если ты соглас{mf|ен|на} сойти с пути скверны. В противном случае... я не стану рисковать бессмертной душой, оставаясь подле".

traits.locale_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, in which the triumphantly malicious scowl of Her Who Thirsts is seen ever clearer. That shadow will swallow you up along with everyone near you. And unless you start fighting it, you will be lost for good. I am willing to help you in that battle — if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Failing that... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."

languages.text: «La inmoralidad y la crueldad te siguen como una sombra luctuosa, una sombra en la que cada día se manifiesta más claramente el rictus de la Sedienta. Esta sombra te engullirá a ti y a cuantos te rodean. Y se volverá irrevocable si no te resistes a ella. Estoy dispuesta a ayudarte si tú lo estás a renunciar a la senda de la corrupción. De lo contrario... no arriesgaré mi alma inmortal permaneciendo a tu lado».
languages.original_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. This shadow will swallow you and everyone around you. And it will become irrevocable if you do not start fighting it. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."

traits.locale_text: «La inmoralidad y la crueldad te siguen como una sombra luctuosa, una sombra en la que cada día se manifiesta más claramente el rictus de la Sedienta. Esta sombra te engullirá a ti y a cuantos te rodean. Y se volverá irrevocable si no te resistes a ella. Estoy dispuesta a ayudarte si tú lo estás a renunciar a la senda de la corrupción. De lo contrario... no arriesgaré mi alma inmortal permaneciendo a tu lado».

languages.text: “邪恶与残忍像阴影一样跟在你身后，饥渴女士恶毒的奸笑声，在阴影中越来越响。阴影会吞噬你和你周围的人，如果你不抵抗阴影的吞噬，这样的未来恐怕不可避免。如果你打算放弃这条腐化之路，那我愿意助你一臂之力。否则……我不会继续留在你身边，不然我不朽的灵魂可能会遭到玷污。”
languages.original_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. This shadow will swallow you and everyone around you. And it will become irrevocable if you do not start fighting it. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."

traits.locale_text: “邪恶与残忍像阴影一样跟在你身后，饥渴女士恶毒的奸笑声，在阴影中越来越响。阴影会吞噬你和你周围的人，如果你不抵抗阴影的吞噬，这样的未来恐怕不可避免。如果你打算放弃这条腐化之路，那我愿意助你一臂之力。否则……我不会继续留在你身边，不然我不朽的灵魂可能会遭到玷污。”

languages.text: « Le vice et la cruauté vous suivent comme une ombre sinistre dans laquelle se dessine de plus en plus nettement le sourire malfaisant de l'Assoiffée. Cette ombre vous dévorera, vous et tous ceux qui vous entourent, et si vous ne commencez pas rapidement à la combattre, vous ne pourrez plus vous en défaire. Je suis prête à vous aider, si vous acceptez de renoncer à la voie de la corruption. Sinon... je ne risquerai pas mon âme immortelle en restant à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. This shadow will swallow you and everyone around you. And it will become irrevocable if you do not start fighting it. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."

traits.locale_text: « Le vice et la cruauté vous suivent comme une ombre sinistre dans laquelle se dessine de plus en plus nettement le sourire malfaisant de l'Assoiffée. Cette ombre vous dévorera, vous et tous ceux qui vous entourent, et si vous ne commencez pas rapidement à la combattre, vous ne pourrez plus vous en défaire. Je suis prête à vous aider, si vous acceptez de renoncer à la voie de la corruption. Sinon... je ne risquerai pas mon âme immortelle en restant à vos côtés. »

languages.text: 「悪徳と残酷さは、陰鬱な影のようにあなたの後をついてくる。その影には、〈かの渇きたる女〉の悪意に満ちた笑みが、ますますハッキリと現れている。この影は、あなたとあなたの周りのすべての人を飲み込むだろう。そして、あなたがそれと戦いを始めなければ、取り返しのつかないことになるだろう。もしあなたが堕落の道を断ち切るなら、私はあなたを助ける用意がある。そうでなければ…あなたの味方をして、私の不滅の魂を危険にさらすような真似をするつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. This shadow will swallow you and everyone around you. And it will become irrevocable if you do not start fighting it. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."

traits.locale_text: 「悪徳と残酷さは、陰鬱な影のようにあなたの後をついてくる。その影には、〈かの渇きたる女〉の悪意に満ちた笑みが、ますますハッキリと現れている。この影は、あなたとあなたの周りのすべての人を飲み込むだろう。そして、あなたがそれと戦いを始めなければ、取り返しのつかないことになるだろう。もしあなたが堕落の道を断ち切るなら、私はあなたを助ける用意がある。そうでなければ…あなたの味方をして、私の不滅の魂を危険にさらすような真似をするつもりはない」

languages.text: "Laster und Grausamkeit folgen Euch wie ein düsterer Schatten. Ein Schatten, in dem sich das bösartige Grinsen von Ihr, die dürstet, immer klarer manifestiert. Dieser Schatten wird Euch und alle um Euch herum verschlingen. Und es wird sich nicht umkehren lassen, wenn Ihr nicht beginnt, dagegen anzukämpfen. Ich bin bereit, Euch dabei zu helfen, wenn Ihr bereit seid, dem Pfad der Verderbnis abzuschwören. Ansonsten ... werde ich meine unsterbliche Seele nicht riskieren, indem ich an Eurer Seite bleibe."
languages.original_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. This shadow will swallow you and everyone around you. And it will become irrevocable if you do not start fighting it. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."

Dieser Schatten wird Euch und alle um Euch herum verschlingen. Und es wird sich nicht umkehren lassen, wenn Ihr nicht beginnt, dagegen anzukämpfen. Ich bin bereit, Euch dabei zu helfen, wenn Ihr bereit seid, dem Pfad der Verderbnis abzuschwören. Ansonsten ... werde ich meine unsterbliche Seele nicht riskieren, indem ich an Eurer Seite bleibe."

languages.text: "Ahlaksızlık ve zalimlik, kederli bir gölge gibi seni takip ediyor. Bu gölgede Susayan'ın kötücül gülümsemesi, kendini gitgide daha fazla belli ediyor. Bu gölge seni ve etrafındaki herkesi yutacak. Onunla savaşmaya başlamazsan geri döndürülemez bir hâl alacak. Yozlaşmanın yolundan caymaya niyetliysen sana yardım etmeye hazırım. Değilsen... Ölümsüz ruhumu senin yanında kalarak tehlikeye atmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Vice and cruelty follow in your wake like a gloomy shadow, a shadow in which the malevolent smirk of She Who Thirsts more and more clearly manifests. I am ready to help you in this if you are willing to renounce the path of corruption. Otherwise... I will not risk my immortal soul by remaining at your side."
